SubjectAmending Order AO-003-OC-46 - Plains Midstream Canada ULC
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board of Amending Order AO-003-OC-46 to PLAINS MIDSTREAM CANADA ULC in order to (1) correct the legal land description for the terminus of the Wapella Pipeline; and (2) update the Certificateâ€™s Schedule A, which sets out the specifications of the pipeline and associated facilities.
